duties_responsibilities.duty: Take ownership of project performance, including safety, quality, schedule, budget, and client satisfaction.
Lead daily safety meetings with project employees.
Maintain a positive relationship with the client, ensuring that the company fulfills its obligations under the contract.
Determine the scheduling of different phases of a project based on established deadlines.
Manage and lead the project team, ensuring that all responsibilities are met.
Coaches and develops project team members.
Consult with superintendents or other managers to monitor construction progress and resolve problems.

education_certification.credential: High School/GED required. Must have 3+ years of experience in a Construction Management Role.
